amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert a requirement that the EPA Administrator shall publish a notice in the Federal Register which would estimate the public health impact resulting from delay of implementation of regulation for the Portland cement manufacturing industry.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new subsection entitled Notice in Federal Register.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 252 (Roll no. 759).
